item.title: admin update
item.description:
admin update by RDG :
Renamed to bring into line with naming conventions.

item.title: code add
item.description:
code add by RDG :
Added link back to index page and provide some text for links to next image and larger/smaller image.

item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
Changed method of identifying pictures, it no longer users request parameters, therefore it will work in a statically generated site as well as in a webapp.

docs add by RDG :
Added some sample pictures.

item.title: docs add

Added basic documentation.
